content:
Attributes

Attributes

  • An attribute is a property or characteristic of a class
  • At any time, each instance of the class has an attribute value for every attribute defined for that class
  • For the Bank Account class:
    • Account Number 123456
    • Name of Bank Wells Fargo Bank
    • Name of Owner Hadar Ziv
    • Account Balance $1234.56
  • Class attributes depend on your viewpoint
    • Example: attributes of Car
